title: Sofia Richie Grainge’s Kidswear Collection Is Perfect for Summer Fun
description: Stock up on swimsuits, dresses, two-piece sets, and more for your little one—starting at just $10.
excerpt: Stock up on swimsuits, dresses, two-piece sets and more for your little one—starting at just $10.
text: When it comes to shopping for little ones, most parents search for pieces that are equal parts adorable, affordable, and durable. While it’s often difficult to find kids’ clothing that checks all of these boxes, Sofia Grainge is proving it doesn’t necessarily have to be. Last December, Grainge, mother of eleven-month-old Eloise Samantha Grainge, teamed up with Amazon Essentials—the retailer’s in-house brand known for producing affordable foundational pieces—to create a line of wardrobe staples perfect for newborns and toddlers. After the success of her first collab, Grainge is back with another drop packed with summer styles that’ll easily take tots from vacation to daycare. This warm-weather line includes everything from ruffled swimwear to sweet dresses and patterned two-piece sets, with prices starting at just $10.Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Lightweight CardiganAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Baby Boys' Short Sleeve Romper 2-PackAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Baby Girls' Eyelet BonnetAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Boys' Pull On Knit ShortsAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Linen DressAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Unisex Toddlers' Slip-On LoafersAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Baby Girls' Sleeveless Ruffle RomperAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Mary Jane Ballet FlatsAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Two Piece SwimsuitAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Baby Boys' Regular Fit T-Shirt and Short SetAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Puff Sleeve DressAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Boys' Nylon Parachute Pants“I was really inspired by new motherhood; I understand that customers are looking for high-quality, comfortable styles when shopping for clothing for their children,” Grainge previously told ELLE.com. “It was really rewarding working with the Amazon Essentials team to create the collection, to ensure that each piece reflected my vision.” Best of all, Grainge’s Amazon Essentials line isn’t only for tots; it even includes a variety of cute mommy-and-me pieces. Whether you gift a cozy pair of pajamas to a new mom or snag a carry-all to haul your little one’s gear, it’s never been easier for chic moms to match with their little ones.Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Women's Quilted Toiletry BagAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Women's Mommy and Me Short Sleeve Pajama SetAmazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Women's Quilted Tote BagFYI, Grainge is the first (and currently only) celebrity to have co-created a collection with Amazon Essentials. Typically, its collaborations are influencer-backed, with names like Alix Earle setting up storefronts on the giant e-tailer’s website.Stock is already going fast, so be sure to shop the new Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge line ASAP before it inevitably sells out.
html:
When it comes to shopping for little ones, most parents search for pieces that are equal parts adorable, affordable, and durable. While it’s often difficult to find kids’ clothing that checks all of these boxes, Sofia Grainge is proving it doesn’t necessarily have to be.

Last December, Grainge, mother of eleven-month-old Eloise Samantha Grainge, teamed up with Amazon Essentials—the retailer’s in-house brand known for producing affordable foundational pieces—to create a line of wardrobe staples perfect for newborns and toddlers. After the success of her first collab, Grainge is back with another drop packed with summer styles that’ll easily take tots from vacation to daycare.

This warm-weather line includes everything from ruffled swimwear to sweet dresses and patterned two-piece sets, with prices starting at just $10.

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Lightweight Cardigan

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Baby Boys' Short Sleeve Romper 2-Pack

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Baby Girls' Eyelet Bonnet

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Boys' Pull On Knit Shorts

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Linen Dress

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Unisex Toddlers' Slip-On Loafers

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Baby Girls' Sleeveless Ruffle Romper

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Mary Jane Ballet Flats

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Two Piece Swimsuit

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Baby Boys' Regular Fit T-Shirt and Short Set

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Girls' Puff Sleeve Dress

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Toddler Boys' Nylon Parachute Pants

“I was really inspired by new motherhood; I understand that customers are looking for high-quality, comfortable styles when shopping for clothing for their children,” Grainge previously told ELLE.com. “It was really rewarding working with the Amazon Essentials team to create the collection, to ensure that each piece reflected my vision.”

Best of all, Grainge’s Amazon Essentials line isn’t only for tots; it even includes a variety of cute mommy-and-me pieces. Whether you gift a cozy pair of pajamas to a new mom or snag a carry-all to haul your little one’s gear, it’s never been easier for chic moms to match with their little ones.

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Women's Quilted Toiletry Bag

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Women's Mommy and Me Short Sleeve Pajama Set

Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Women's Quilted Tote Bag

FYI, Grainge is the first (and currently only) celebrity to have co-created a collection with Amazon Essentials. Typically, its collaborations are influencer-backed, with names like Alix Earle setting up storefronts on the giant e-tailer’s website.

Stock is already going fast, so be sure to shop the new Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge line ASAP before it inevitably sells out.
